core.domain.warriors.defenders.towers

Class TowerFeatureDecorator

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • core.domain.warriors.defenders.Defender
        • core.domain.warriors.defenders.towers.Tower
          • core.domain.warriors.defenders.towers.TowerFeatureDecorator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observer, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FirePower, FireRange, FireSpeed

    public abstract class TowerFeatureDecorator
extends Tower
implements Observer
    This class is used for decorator design pattern for towers

    0.1
    Author:
    Team5
